content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
--
USE gold_db
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE CreateSqlServerlessView_Gold @ViewName NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(max)

    set @statement = N'CREATE or alter VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS 
        SELECT *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET( 
            BULK ''https://datalakebsv1.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/'+ @ViewName + '/'',
            FORMAT = ''DELTA''
        ) AS [result]
    '
EXEC (@statement)

END
GO


EXEC CreateSqlServerlessView_Gold @ViewName = 'Address'
